name: Rekindled (Halleester)
description:
This game was created in 7 days for the Dungeon Crawler Game Jam 2023!

Rekindled is a horror-themed dungeon crawler where the player must try to escape the pitch-black cave they find themselves in. Use your lantern and matches to illuminate your path, avoiding traps and creatures hiding in the dark.

Light is great for showing the path ahead, but it also reveals you to anything hiding in the shadows. Balance your use of light and darkness to navigate forward through the cave. Be careful to not run out of matches for your lantern though...

Note: I forgot to put a sign explaining the left clicking with the lantern can light objects and hold back the roaming enemy. So. Left click please?

Team:

Music: Christoph Jakob

Everything else: Alex Hallee

Controls:

Move: WASD

Rotate: QE

Interact (w/o lantern): Left Click

Light Objects/Push Back Monsters (w/ lantern): Left Click

Relight Lantern (if lantern extinguished): Left Click

Extinguish Lantern: Space

Free-Look: Hold Right Click
